bibl.title: Enteuxis Concerning Illegal Sale of Cedria.
bibl.note: Arsinoite nome (Oxyrhyncha?), mid-II cent. BC? Fragment acquired by the Vienna Papyrus Collection in 2003. Complaint by a tax farmer (most probably of a native Egyptian ethnic background) against some unidentified ibis-buriers who appear to have violated his officially approved concession by obtaining cedria from other sources unauthorised by the state.
bibl.seg: Csaba A. Láda & Amphilochios Papathomas, Enteuxis Concerning Illegal Sale of Cedria.

Arsinoite nome (Oxyrhyncha?), mid-II cent. BC? Fragment acquired by the Vienna Papyrus Collection in 2003. Complaint by a tax farmer (most probably of a native Egyptian ethnic background) against some unidentified ibis-buriers who appear to have violated his officially approved concession by obtaining cedria from other sources unauthorised by the state.
